name: Planet X Cafe
tag_list: hospitality, restaurants, travel, entertainment, farming, organic-food
overview:
Planet X Cafe is a restaurant located in Rehoboth Beach, Delaware. It is now in its fourteenth season of operation and has won numerous awards from various newspapers, publication and magazines including local and national.

The restaurant is recognised for its sourcing of natural and free-range foods from local suppliers and farms. Planet X Cafe provides a menu that is varied and is updated yearly with weekly additions always included. The menu offers a variety of gourmet dishes ranging from vegetarian options, seafood, and meat dishes that have been ethically sourced.

The restaurant decor is an eclectic mix of colors and features Buddhaâ€™s and various other icons and statues in the restaurant. The cocktail bar otherwise named the Buddha Bar is a funky and decorative area where specialty drinks and cocktails are served ranging from the Nirvana Cocktail and the Vesper Martini.

Planet X Cafe along with its restaurant provides a catering company that has provided meals for Robin Williams, Sting, Harry Connick, Jt., and various other celebrities and TV shows.

Planet X Cafe offers a culinary experience for casual and fine dining. Their motto is: “Beautiful Food for Exotic Spirits”
